aboutHotel.getPropertyDetailsByHotelIdQuery: query MyQuery($hotelId:String!) { getPropertyDetailsByHotelId(input: {hotelId: $hotelId}) { brand { code createdAt createdBy description groupId gsi1pk gsi1sk id images { fileName index master ratio16to9 ratio1to1 ratio21to9 } name pk sk updatedAt updatedBy version } group { code createdAt createdBy customSenderEmail description firebaseToken id name sk pk updatedAt updatedBy version whiteLabellingConfigurations { appConfigs region userPoolId userPoolWebClientId } } hotel { brandId cancellationPolicy { name type url } checkInTime checkOutTime code covid19Regulations { name type url } createdAt createdBy currency dataProtection { name type url } description devicesEndpoint features groupId gsi1pk gsi1sk gsi2pk gsi2sk id images { fileName index master ratio16to9 ratio1to1 ratio21to9 } information { displayTitle field index type value } interests isDevicesEnabled isUIBuilderEnabled location { addressLine1 addressLine2 area city country latitude longitude postalCode state timezone } maxdevices name phoneNumber pk privacyLaws { name type url } sk starRating termsAndConditions { name type url } travelType updatedAt version updatedBy } } }

thingsToDo.getHotelAmenityDetailsQuery:
query MyQuery($hotelId: String!, $lang: String) {
  getHotelAmenityDetails(input: {hotelId: $hotelId, lang: $lang}) {
    amenities {
      categoryId
      categoryIds
      createdAt
      createdBy
      description
      highlights
      hotelId
      id
      images {
        fileName
        index
        master
        ratio16to9
        ratio1to1
        ratio21to9
      }
      information {
        displayTitle
        field
        index
        type
        value
      }
      isActive
      name
      pk
      sk
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      version
    }
    categories {
      createdAt
      createdBy
      hotelId
      id
      name
      sk
      pk
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      version
    }
  }
}

offers.getOffersDetailsQuery:
query MyQuery($hotelId: String!, $lang: String) {
  getOffersDetails(input: {hotelId: $hotelId, lang: $lang}) {
    createdAt
    createdBy
    description
    isActive
    name
    hotelId
    id
    highLights
    customAttributes {
      key
      value
    }
    CTA {
      URL
      cardPlacement
      contact
      emailId
      phoneCode
      phoneNumber
      redirectTo
      type
      status
      displayCTATitle
      redirectData
    }
    duration {
      alwaysActive
      endDate
      endTime
      startDate
      startTime
      timings {
        day
        offerTime
      }
    }
    notification {
      createdAt
      description
      devices
      name
    }
    images {
      fileName
      index
      master
      ratio16to9
      ratio1to1
      ratio21to9
    }
    contact {
      email
      phoneNumber
    }
    pk
    sk
    type
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
    version
  }
}

houseKeeping.getHouseKeepingDetailsQuery:
query MyQuery($hotelId: String!, $lang: String) {
  getServiceRequestDetails(input: {hotelId: $hotelId, lang: $lang}) {
    houseKeeping {
      code
      confirmationMessage
      customAttributes {
        key
        value
        __typename
      }
      customSchedule
      description
      hotelId
      hours {
        allTime
        close
        day
        everyday
        open
        __typename
      }
      icon
      id
      images {
        index
        master
        __typename
      }
      isActive
      isItemActive
      items {
        description
        id
        maxQuantityActive
        maxQuantity
        name
        __typename
      }
      maxQuantity
      maxQuantityActive
      name
      schedule
      scheduleActive
      __typename
    }
    concierge {
      code
      createdAt
      confirmationMessage
      createdBy
      customSchedule
      description
      hotelId
      hours {
        allTime
        close
        everyday
        day
        open
        __typename
      }
      icon
      id
      images {
        fileName
        index
        master
        ratio16to9
        ratio1to1
        ratio21to9
        __typename
      }
      isActive
      isItemActive
      items {
        description
        id
        maxQuantity
        maxQuantityActive
        name
        __typename
      }
      maxQuantity
      maxQuantityActive
      name
      pk
      resident
      schedule
      scheduleActive
      sk
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      version
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

query MyQuery($hotelId: String!, $restaurantId: String, $lang: String) {

      isActive

        id

            __typename

            status

          __typename

        }

        description

          description
          disclaimer
          name

            always
            from {

              time
              __typename
            }
            till {

              time
              __typename
            }
            __typename
